p_1: Medical specialist with training and equipment necessary to diagnose and treat properly diseases related to  ear, nose and throat, as well as the corresponding surgerys. Also known as ENT doctors.
p_2: Ear: Wax impactaction, infections, hearing problems, vertigo, foreing bodies. Surgeries: Otoplasty, tympanoplasty, ventilation tubes.
p_3: Nose: Allergies, traumas, bleedings, sinusitis, polyps, nasal deviations. Surgeries such as: Septoplasty, Rhinoplasty, sinus surgery.
p_4: Throat: infections, voice problems, allergies, snoring, with surgeries like amygdalectomy.
